title: Should I wait for iPhone 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: All The Leaks Found So Far:  Why Should You Wait For The New IPhone 12 And What News We Have About IPhone 12? Usually new iPhone models are coming in like a clockwork, but Apple itself has now said that the iPhone 12 series will not go on sale until a few weeks later than usual, which presumably means in October sometime. Indeed, the new release date leaked is in line with that, as Jon Prosser (a leaker with a mixed track record) said the iPhone 12 range would be released on Week beginning on October 12 (which may mean an announcement on Tuesday, October 13, because on Tuesday, Apple always reveals stuff) Apparently, pre-orders for the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Max will then open in the same week-possibly on Friday, October 16, based on the past form from Apple. After that, on the week beginning on October 19 (probably meaning Friday, October 23), the phones apparently will ship. But obviously the iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro Max will not be up for pre-order or ship until sometime in November. However, we would take these statements with a pinch of salt, particularly as Mark Gurman (a strong track record Apple leaker) replied with a thumb down emoji, indicating that Prosser was incorrect. Yeah, when are you going to get an iPhone 12? We really can't tell for sure. Apple 's statement isn't clear, and it might just be referring to when the phones go on sale. The majority of the reports seem to point to a one- to two-month wait, so October or November seems possible-though the phones could well be released before that. How Much Will The IPhone 12 Cost? The iPhone 12 price is something that leaks have made the release date a little clearer, and from what we hear it's likely to remain largely in line with the iPhone range for 2019. The iPhone 11 started at $699/ £729 / AU$1,199 for comparison, the iPhone 11 Pro begins at $999/$1,049 / AU$1,749 and the iPhone 11 Pro Max starts at $1,099/$1,149 / AU$1,899 for comparison.There is no precise information about prices for the UK or Australia, but if the above information is correct, we would expect those to fall roughly in line with last year's versions. That's not to say the phones would cost too much more at launch, particularly because Apple appears to be cutting costs elsewhere, with the battery board reports being much cheaper than on the iPhone 11, and the phones might not be bundled with earbuds or a charging cable, but it may mean a price increase of some sort. In any case, as our guide states, you probably should wait for the iPhone 12 range to launch before purchasing any new iPhone. What Will The IPhone 12 Look Like? The architecture of the iPhone 12 looks expected to be a major change from the smartphone of Apple 's recent few generations. The iPhone 4 and the iPhone 5 remember? Reports say that the design of the iPhone 12 would be partly inspired by those models, and some elements of the iPad Pro 2020 are expected to be mixed in. Specifically, reliable leaks have indicated that the iPhone 12 would have a more flatter metal frame than the iPhone 11 series, with Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, who's a very trusted source, being among those to say this. We have heard from Jon Prosser that the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Max will have aluminum frames and the iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Pro and iPhone 12 Max will have stainless steel frames, and that all four phones will have smaller notches than the iPhone 11 series.All that said, leaked renders which are more recent than most of the above display some major variations in design to earlier leaks, as you can see below. Also now Sonny Dickson (a leaker with a good track record) has shared with the iPhone 12 range dummy units that seem to be in line with this-as well as this- having flat edges, as speculated above. This can be seen here. That said, other credible sources tend to be skeptical about these leaks, particularly when it comes to the video, so we would take them with a pinch of salt. For now we would say the leaks and information are more likely to be right towards the top of this section. The Apple iPhone 12 released September 17, focuses on performance and quality improvements, along with new features like Memoji, Screen Time, Group FaceTime, and more.  There are useful features that come with iPhone 12. Some of them are, Focus on performance improvementsMemojiGroup FaceTimeARKit 2.0New digital health featuresBetter parental controlsDo Not Disturb improvementsGrouped Notifications With iPhone 12, Apple doubled down on performance, working from top to bottom to make iPhones and iPads faster and more responsive. Apple has made improvements on devices both old and new, and iPhone 12 has been designed to run on all devices able to run iOS 11. With Apple's performance improvements, apps launch faster, the keyboard appears faster, and the Camera is quicker to open. Apple has also optimized the system when it's under load, making iOS devices faster when you need performance the most. Though Apple focused on under-the-hood improvements for iPhone 12, there is a long list of new features in the update that makes this an impressive new version of iOS.  Apple introduced a new customizable Animoji called Memoji, which you can personalize to look like you. Memoji, Animoji, and other fun effects can be used both in Messages and with FaceTime through the new Effects camera. A Group FaceTime feature lets you video chat with up to 32 people at one time, but requires iOS 12.1.4 or later. Apple built a comprehensive set of time management and focus tools into iPhone 12, starting with a new Screen Time feature. Screen Time provides weekly activity reports detailing how you used your iOS device, including how much time you spend in each app, how often you pick up your phone, how long you spend on the iPhone or iPad, and which apps are sending the most notifications.  These are some main features comes with Apple iPhone 12. In fact the above facts showing why it is recommended get this phone as your iDevice.
